forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
